TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMCBUTTON extends System.ValueType

summary.span: Contém valores usados para criar botões em uma barra de ferramentas.

span.span: Contains values that are used to create buttons on a toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações sobre a programação com a estrutura MMCBUTTON e o Microsoft Management Console (MMC), consulte o [guia do programador do MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the MMCBUTTON structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
